T02D3160:180b-0: @180b # // rgya gar skad du padma narte shva ra s'a dha nam /
T02D3160:180b-2: padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi sgrub thabs //
T02D3160:180b-3: sngar brjod pa'i rim pas sna tshogs padmar zla ba
T02D3160:180b-4: la yi ge hr'i: dmar po yongs su gyur pa
T02D3160:180b-5: las / bdag nyid padma gar gyi dbang phyug tu bsgom par byas te /
T02D3160:180b-6: sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa ;
T02D3160:180b-7: zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa sku mdog dmar po rgyan
T02D3160:180b-8: rnams thams cad kyis brgyan pa snang ba mtha' yas
T02D3160:180b-10: g-yon ngos na gos dkar mos legs par 'khyud cing 'khyud pa'i stangs kyis gnas pa'o //
T02D3160:180b-11: phyag g-yon pas padma dmar po bsnams pa'o //
T02D3160:180b-12: phyag gzhan g-yas pa ni gar byed pa'i stangs kyis khabs kyi phyag rgyar kha 'byed pa'o //
T02D3160:180b-13: de nas ni aom de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams
T02D3160:180b-14: cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i rang
T02D3160:180b-15: bzhin gyi bdag nyid ni nga yin no zhes sngags
T02D3160:180b-17: de'i rjes la phyogs brgyad du lha mo brgyad rnam par bsam par bya ba'o //
T02D3160:180b-18: de la padma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa'i shar
T02D3160:180b-19: gyi 'dab ma la rnam par gzigs ma padma dkar
T02D3160:180b-21: lho'i 'dab ma la sgrol ma ljang gu shing sngon po dang padma 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3160:181a-0: nub kyi 'dab ma la rnga ma 'khor lo ser @181a * //
T02D3160:181a-3: byang gi 'dab ma la khro gnyer can /
T02D3160:181a-4: padma skya bo dang ser po 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3160:181a-5: shar gyi grva'i 'dab ma la padma'i dri ldan ma padma ser po dang dmar ser 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3160:181a-6: lho'i grva'i 'dab ma la rdo rje padma'i dbang phyug
T02D3160:181a-7: ma nam mkha'i mdog dang dkar ba'i padma 'dzin pa'o
T02D3160:181a-8: // nub kyi grva'i 'dab ma la sna tshogs padma dkar ba dang dmar po 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3160:181a-9: byang gi grva'i 'dab ma la sna tshogs rdo rje
T02D3160:181a-10: ma kha dog sna tshogs pa sna tshogs padma 'dzin
T02D3160:181a-11: pa'o // de dag thams cad kyang zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma skyil krung bcas shing zhi ba'o //
T02D3160:181a-12: lte ba la ni bcom ldan 'das nyid do //
T02D3160:181a-13: de nas gsang sngags bzlas par bya ste /
T02D3160:181a-14: aom hr'i: padma narte shva ra h'um /
T02D3160:181a-15: padma gar gyi dbang phyug ces bya ba'i 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sgrub thabs so /
T02D3160:181a-16: pandi ta chen po ratna a'a ka ra'i zhal snga
